scripts.dev:electron: concurrently "bun run dev:web" "bun run --cwd electron dev"
scripts.build:web:electron: cross-env BUILD_TARGET=electron bun run --cwd packages/web build
scripts.build: bun run build:server && bun run build:web && bun run build:electron
scripts.dist:electron: bun run build:web:electron && bun run build:server:electron:mac && shx rm -rf electron/web electron/server && shx cp -r packages/web/dist electron/web && shx mkdir -p electron/server && shx cp packages/server/dist-electron/pen-bridge-server electron/server/ && shx cp -r packages/server/src/prompts electron/server/prompts && cd electron && npm install && npm run build && npm run dist
scripts.dist:electron:win: bun run build:web:electron && bun run build:server:electron:win && shx rm -rf electron/web electron/server && shx cp -r packages/web/dist electron/web && shx mkdir -p electron/server && shx cp packages/server/dist-electron/pen-bridge-server.exe electron/server/ && shx cp -r packages/server/src/prompts electron/server/prompts && cd electron && npm install && npm run build && npm run dist:win
